title: TLOU2 日本第2週消量下跌 85.45%

replies.msg:
https://www.spieltimes.com/news/the-last-of-us-part-ii-sales-dropped-85-week-on-week-japan/

The Last of Us Part II boxed sales data for Japan are out and it seems the game has dropped severely in its second week. According to the reports, The Last of Us Part II sales in Japan has dropped by a massive 85% week-on-week.



To be accurate, it’s 85.45%.

Earlier, we reported on how The Last of Us Part II boxed sales dropped 80% week-on-week in the UK. Some said it wasn’t unusual, but if you compare the drop to other Sony first-party titles, it’s very significant.

Keep in mind, these are data for retail only and not digital sales.

To compare the figures, Uncharted 4, another Naughty Dog game, saw a 78% drop in sales during its second week. In contrast, Marvel’s Spider-Man boxed sales dropped by 42% in its second week with God of War seeing a 35% fall in sales. Days Gone, on the other hand, saw a 60% drop.

To talk figures, The Last of Us Part II sold a whopping 178,696 retail copies in its first week in Japan. The game easily ranked #1 in the sales chart for the same week. In the second week, it plummeted to the 4th position, by selling only 25,993 retail copies, getting beat by Animal Crossing: New Horizons, Ring Fit Adventure, and Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics.

We’re trying to gather more data regarding The Last of Us Part II’s sales across different regions and countries. We’ll update you when we have more information. If you have something to input, feel free to mail us at support@spieltimes.com

Liana Kerzner, a YouTuber, and Analyst said, “These figures, more than any online screaming, indicate what the public interest actually is.”

Make sure you subscribe to our push-notifications and never miss an update from the world of video games. Until next time, Stay Safe, Respect All Lives, and Happy Gaming!

《最後生還者二部曲》Speedrun達人12分鐘跑出「好結局」世界紀錄



《最後生還者 二部曲》（The Last of Us Part II；TLOU2）自上市以來因劇情安排與總監發言引發一連串爭議，這股風氣也影響到了遊戲圈裡的 Speedrun 領域，雖然相比之下似乎沒什麼達人在挑戰《TLOU2》紀錄，但知名 Speedrun 玩家 Distortion2 倒是跑出了一個 12 分鐘通關的非官方世界紀錄，還獲得數萬玩家激賞——因為他跑的是「Good Game」Speedrun。



Distortion2 是一位 Speedrun 玩家，過去曾挑戰過不少高難度遊戲的速通紀錄，當初《死亡擱淺》（Death Stranding）他也在遊戲上市不久以 7 小時內通關，如今他心血來潮挑戰目前話題正夯的《最後生還者 二部曲》，僅 12 分鐘 54 秒便達成好結局...

是的，就是艾比第一次登場後，直接操作她跳下懸崖，完成了「Good Game」Speedrun。事實上，這個「好結局」也是海內外許多對劇情不滿的粉絲所創造的迷因，因為絕大多數玩家不能接受艾比的劇情與之後的發展。

https://www.4gamers.com.tw/news/detail/43815/tlou-part-2-good-ending-speedrun-in-12-mins
